summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys regarding an update on a human trafficking subject referral related to Leon Black. It mentions deconfliction with another party and communication with Jeanne Christensen, and includes attached notes from conversations with counsel and initial referral calls.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: Mentioned as the person to whom information about the Leon Black human trafficking subject referral was relayed, and with whom further communication is planned.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of an additional human trafficking (HT) subject referral being discussed among prosecutors.

connections.description: Christensen is being updated by prosecutors regarding a human trafficking subject referral involving Leon Black, indicating a legal or investigative connection.

events.title: Update on Leon Black HT Subject Referral
events.description: Assistant United States Attorneys discuss an update regarding an additional human trafficking subject referral involving Leon Black, including deconfliction efforts and communication with Jeanne Christensen.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email update among prosecutors dated June 12, 2023.
It concerns an 'Additional HT Subject Referral' related to financier Leon Black.
The prosecutors are deconflicting with another party and have communicated with attorney Jeanne Christensen about the matter.
Attachments include notes from conversations with counsel and the initial referral call.
